item.title: How to publish your notes for free with Quartz
item.description:
Quartz just won Best Tool in the Obsidian Gems of the Year 2023 awards, and with good reason. It’s a free, open-source static site generator that works really well with Markdown-based note-taking apps– including Obsidian, which it was originally designed for.

Here’s what Quartz looks like when published.
